titles.title: An original resolution to pay a gratuity to Oscar M. Holmes, Jr. and Theodore Holmes.

calendar.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.

action.text: Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 624.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 4/21/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Senate to pay a gratuity to the surviving children of a deceased Senate employee.
